welcome_message_body: Welcome to Cerreto Guidi, a charming town in the heart of Tuscany known for its beautiful scenery, rich history, and delightful cuisine. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring and experiencing all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lucca Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Lucca Airport, mainly serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Peretola Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Galileo Galilei Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Galileo Galilei Airport, primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
